snippet.title: MidKnight Story - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Hi Everyone! Here's MidKnight Story's teaser trailer!
It showcases some of the exploration mechanics that Paran can use to explore the game's open world. 
Remember: MidKnight Story will lauch on Kickstarter on March 2019!

Special thanks go to Tilo Alpermann for creating the teaser trailer and its music! 

P.S. regarding the game's development, the loot mechanics are coming along great and I can wait to showcase them!

You can follow MidKnight Story on:

https://discord.gg/auNAAUN

https://www.facebook.com/midknightstory

https://www.instagram.com/midknightstory

https://www.twitter.com/virel92

https://www.midknightstory.com
